Eco-friendly guided cycling tours.

Escape the hustle. Join us to discover the magic of rural areas on our full day Eco Educational Cycling Tours, suitable for all ages.

Explore less tourist crowded places in the city, visit the favourite spots of locals and get an authentic experience of the life in the city.

plsworkWe offer unique guided tours through exciting destinations like Chemuyil, Buenos Aires, Bangkok, Oaxaca & many more.

We handpick the most scenic biking routes -our biking trip leaders know the least trafficked cycling routes, with the most terrific spots.
